name: reportgeneratortest
description: ReportGenerator converts coverage reports generated by coverlet, OpenCover, dotCover, Visual Studio, NCover, Cobertura, JaCoCo, Clover, gcov, or lcov into human readable reports in various formats.
author: Palmmedia

inputs.name: reports
inputs.label: Reports
inputs.helpMarkDown: The coverage reports that should be parsed (separated by semicolon). Globbing is supported.

inputs.name: targetdir
inputs.label: Target directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: The directory where the generated report should be saved.

inputs.name: reporttypes
inputs.label: Report types
inputs.helpMarkDown: The output formats and scope (separated by semicolon) Values: Badges, Clover, Cobertura, OpenCover, CsvSummary, Html, Html_Dark, Html_Light, Html_BlueRed, HtmlChart, HtmlInline, HtmlInline_AzurePipelines, HtmlInline_AzurePipelines_Dark, HtmlInline_AzurePipelines_Light, HtmlSummary, Html_BlueRed_Summary, JsonSummary, CodeClimate, Latex, LatexSummary, lcov, MarkdownSummary, MarkdownAssembliesSummary, MarkdownSummaryGithub, MarkdownDeltaSummary, MHtml, SvgChart, SonarQube, TeamCitySummary, TextSummary, TextDeltaSummary, Xml, XmlSummary

inputs.name: sourcedirs
inputs.label: Source directories
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optional directories which contain the corresponding source code (separated by semicolon). The source directories are used if coverage report contains classes without path information.

inputs.name: historydir
inputs.label: History directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optional directory for storing persistent coverage information. Can be used in future reports to show coverage evolution.

inputs.name: plugins
inputs.label: Plugins
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optional plugin files for custom reports or custom history storage (separated by semicolon).

inputs.name: assemblyfilters
inputs.label: Assembly filters
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optional list of assemblies that should be included or excluded in the report. Exclusion filters take precedence over inclusion filters. Wildcards are allowed.

inputs.name: classfilters
inputs.label: Class filters
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optional list of classes that should be included or excluded in the report. Exclusion filters take precedence over inclusion filters. Wildcards are allowed.

inputs.name: filefilters
inputs.label: File filters
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optional list of files that should be included or excluded in the report. Exclusion filters take precedence over inclusion filters. Wildcards are allowed.

inputs.name: riskhotspotassemblyfilters
inputs.label: Assembly filters for risk hotspots
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optional list of assemblies that should be included or excluded in the risk hotspots. Exclusion filters take precedence over inclusion filters. Wildcards are allowed.

inputs.name: riskhotspotclassfilters
inputs.label: Class filters for risk hotspots
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optional list of classes that should be included or excluded in the risk hotspots. Exclusion filters take precedence over inclusion filters. Wildcards are allowed.

inputs.name: verbosity
inputs.label: Verbosity
inputs.helpMarkDown: The verbosity level of the log messages. Values: Verbose, Info, Warning, Error, Off

inputs.name: publishCodeCoverageResults
inputs.label: Publish code coverage results
inputs.helpMarkDown: Directly publish report in 'Code Coverage' tab. Makes the 'PublishCodeCoverageResults' task obsolete.

inputs.name: license
inputs.label: License
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optional license for PRO version. Get your license here: https://reportgenerator.io/pro

messages.PublishCodeCoverageResultsRequiresCobert: When using 'publishCodeCoverageResults: true' please add 'Cobertura' as a report type
messages.PublishCodeCoverageResultsRequiresHtmlFo: When using 'publishCodeCoverageResults: true' please add one of the Html report types
messages.MultipleSummaryFilesFound: Multiple file or directory matches were found. Using the first match: %s
